item.title: Using Linux as a daily driver
item.description: I have been using Linux distros for my main OS for almost a year. I was originally on Ubuntu but have since moved over to arch in January. Here is my rundown on how I've set it up and what my thoughts are.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Finding RDS End of Life Data from AWS (My first FOSS contribution)
item.description: There is no API to gather data about when AWS RDS service will enter into end of life in advance. I went about finding a way to gather it programmatically
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Creating a Websocket VPS
item.description: I created a multiservice websocket server. Includes Nginx, Socket.io, and PM2. As well as plenty of DevOps magic
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: TampaDevs event page fly through
item.description: I created the landing page for the TampaDevs Bayhacks hack-a-thon. Fly through a 3D environment to get the latest info on the event
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Multiplayer browser card game
item.description: A new game where you can play with up to three friends. This is based on the classic Egyptian Ratscrew / Slap card game.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Update: Improvements to Lambda into Discord web scraper
item.description: I have wrote a previous post about a web scraper I integrated with a Discord bot. I have made additions to it since as well as entirely rewrote the infrastructure around it.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Final for Data Analytics and Security class
item.description: I learned a lot this semester and worked with a group to analyze some real work data for my final. I used this to create a Python script which did data analysis. Popular Python libraries like pandas and matplotlib were essential for our final.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: TadHack 2022
item.description: This is my 4rd hackathon event but my first time leading a team. I pitched an idea and was able to help put a team together to make it a reality. This Three.js project will finish what Elon Musk never could.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Introduction to Health Informatics
item.description: My first course at Georgia Tech, this shows a final project for Introduction to Health Informatics. I chose to create a web app which assists users to manage their obesity. This uses charts as well as 3D models to make tracking weight progress fun.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: DevOps Talk for TampaDevs
item.description: I gave a talk to the community of TampaDevs about how to get started in DevOps
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Admitted to Georgia Tech Online
item.description: I have begun my Masters program for GAO in Computer Science
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Newly hired at Oddball
item.description: I have started a new job at Oddball, doing DevOps on AWS
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Three.js Spinner
item.description: After playing the game Rust, I loved using a spinner item and wanted to port it to the browser with Three.js
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: TadHack-athon
item.description: I participated in a weekend global hackathon, our team ended up getting great results!
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: A Group Financial Tracker
item.description: Create an account and join in on a group financial goal. Complete with charts and data records tables.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Web Scraper
item.description: Serverless web scraper integrated into a Discord bot
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Newly hired at Leidos
item.description: I started a new job at Leidos, a defense contractor
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Type Racing Game
item.description: Web Sockets for live multiplayer type racing competitions.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Ellucian Search Engine
item.description: A machine learned search engine for Atlassian Confluence data
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Senior Semester Final, E-commerce Site
item.description: School Final to build a feature rich full stack application
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Senior Project Trafficking Spotters
item.description: My Senior Project where I worked the full stack to assist in finding and getting help to those affected by human trafficking.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: eCRM Dashboard
item.description: A finer look into the work done for a React Dashboard for my job
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Creating the Landing Page
item.description: This applications landing page simulates a terminal with Unix commands. Here I break down how I made it
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Ellucian Cloud Internship Extension
item.description: My 12 week contract has been extended an additional 21 weeks. I completed my dashboard and will be maintaining it as well as starting new projects
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Creation of this Blog
item.description: I wanted to create a project in React and then deploy using server side rendering. While the tech stack is overkill for a simple blog. This is more of a test of the technology and becoming literate at it.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Ellucian DevOps Internship Details
item.description: I have begun an internship at Ellucian. This is a 12-week contract which can be extended. This will involve work with AWS, Ansible and Jenkins.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Asteroid BattleGrounds: Game Jam Orlando
item.description: I participated in the Orlando Game Jam and created a Nodejs browser game called Asteroid BattleGrounds. It is made using a framework called Phaser. This was a lot of fun and I hope to do another soon.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Ellucian Help Desk Technician
item.description: I have started my job at Ellucian. They offer IT solutions for colleges and universities.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Tech Support Shop
item.description: Created for a school project. This is a mock local website for selling tech support. Services include a home appointment request form and even a mock live chat. There are picture modals in the gallery. As well as some fun CSS for a company history timeline. Check this one out.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Django Social Blog
item.description: A social media feature clone of Twitter. Allows the creation of groups. As well as the following and posting to groups. There is a section for account creation.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Django Personal Blog
item.description: Created while learning the Django Framework. Allows for blog posts, comments and liking posts/comments.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool

item.title: Photography Website
item.description: I wanted to make an aesthetic mock local photography website. I have gotten the opportunity to take a lot of great photos on vacations I have gone on. I use these photos to create a website which is clean and photo focused.
item.dc:creator: CodaBool
